name: site
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: site
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a place where something is, was, or will be built, or where something happened, is happening, or will happen
trans_examp.trans_cn: （建筑物的）地点，位置；建筑工地；（某事发生的）地点，现场

example.eg: The company hasn't yet chosen the site for the new hospital.
example.egtrans: 公司尚未选定新医院的院址。

example.eg: This is the site of the accident.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: inside a factory, office building, etc.
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 在（工厂、办公楼等的）内部

example.eg: There are two restaurants on site.
The office complex has an on-site nursery.
example.egtrans: 这片办公楼群有一个内部托儿所。

dsense.name: site
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: site
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the piece of ground on which you can put up a tent, park a caravan, etc.

example.eg: We chose a large, level site for our tent.
example.egtrans: 我们选了一大片平坦的地方搭帐篷。

name: site
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to exist or be built in a particular place

example.eg: The company's head office is sited in Rome.
example.egtrans: 该公司的总部设在罗马。
